comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content:
29 April 1943: P-47C serial 41-6189 (coded LM-P) of the 62nd Fighter Squadron, 56th FG is one of the lucky ones to return to Horsham St. Faith this day. The 56th came out on the short end of the stick in its first engagement with the Luftwaffe, losing LT Winston Garth and CAPT John McClure; they became the Group's first POWs.

This photo features the battle damage sustained to the left wing flap assembly.
